model.environment.map

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.environment.map.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    The map forms the basis for our model. It gathers all physical elements of the model and contains useful methods for interaction.
    Author:
    S.A.M. Janssen

    • Field Detail

      • mapComponents

        private com.google.common.collect.Multimap<java.lang.Class<?>,SimulationObject> mapComponents
        The SimulationObjects on the map. The Multimap is used as an internal representation to quickly find collections of SimulationObjects of a specified type. This results in some extra memory usage, but enables fast access times.

      • height

        private double height
        The height of the map.

      • width

        private double width
        The width of the map.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map()
        Creates a map that automatically scales to the items that are added.

      • Map

        public Map(double width,
           double height)
        Creates the map with a minimum size. The size increases if items are added that fall outside of the dimensions.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the map (in meter).
        height - The height of the map (in meter).

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(SimulationObject object)
        Adds a map component to the map.
        Parameters:
        object - The map component.

      • checkForAddIssues

        private void checkForAddIssues(SimulationObject simulationObject)
        Checks if there is an issue by adding a SimulationObject to the map. Throw an exception if there is.
        Parameters:
        simulationObject - The simulation object.

      • getHeight

        public double getHeight()
        Gets the height of the map.
        Returns:
        The height.

      • getMapComponents

        public <T> java.util.Collection<T> getMapComponents(java.lang.Class<T> className)
        Get all MapComponents that are an instance of a specific class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The class instance.
        Parameters:
        className - The class name.
        Returns:
        A Collection of the map components.

      • getWidth

        public double getWidth()
        Gets the width of the map.
        Returns:
        The width.

      • isOutOfBounds

        public boolean isOutOfBounds(Position position)
        Check if a Position is out of map.
        Parameters:
        position - The position.
        Returns:
        True if it is out of the map, false otherwise.

      • remove

        public void remove(MapComponent mapComponent)
        Remove a MapComponent from the map.
        Parameters:
        mapComponent - The map component.

      • updateDimensions

        private void updateDimensions()
        Updates the dimensions of the map.
